abstract: Editorial cites research that finds that while some women have their lives saved by mammograms, a vast majority found to have tumors do not benefit; holds women now face difficult choice about screening.
snippet: Considering that only a small portion of women with breast cancer benefited from mammography in a new analysis, all women now face a difficult choice about the screening.
lead_paragraph: Considering that only a small portion of women with breast cancer benefited from mammography in a new analysis, all women now face a difficult choice about the screening.
